snippet: Federal agents revived the hunt for the remains of the Teamsters president Jimmy Hoffa, bringing excavation equipment to a field in Oakland Township, north of Detroit.
abstract: Federal agents revive hunt for remains of Teamsters president Jimmy Hoffa, bringing excavation equipment to field in Oakland Township, north of Detroit.
lead_paragraph: Federal agents revived the hunt for the remains of the Teamsters president Jimmy Hoffa, bringing excavation equipment to a field in Oakland Township, north of Detroit.

headline.main: Michigan: Search for Hoffa’s Remains Is on Again
